problem.legend: If the mass of a structure increases, will the structure tend to oscillate faster, slower, or the same.

choicegroup.label: If the mass of a structure increases, will the structure tend to oscillate faster, slower, or the same.
choicegroup.choice: If the mass increases the structure will tend to oscillate faster
If the mass increases the structure will tend to oscillate slower
If the mass increases there will be no change in how the structure oscillates
